case.summary: Sentencing of accused for possession of proceeds of trafficking over $10,000 -- Accused pleaded guilty -- Accused was used a mule of drug trafficking money by drug trafficking ring -- Accused, 34, had positive pre-sentence report -- Accused steadily employed and had common law spouse -- No prior criminal record -- Joint sentence recommendation of 18-month conditional sentence -- HELD: Conditional sentence of 18 months imposed -- Accused under house arrest for first three months -- Joint sentence proposal accepted -- Accused could serve sentence in community without endangering safety of community.
